Articles.Content:
This is what it looks like inside the ship when the command pod explodes, seconds before death.

Yes, thats fire.

The thought going through his mind.

\'\'Did the boosters burn out before i seperated them?\'\'

The thought going through his mind.

\'\'Did the boosters burn out before i seperated them?\'\'

Eeeyup
is that jeb hes not screaming at impending doom.

'Jeb It\'s OK.'

'WHAT THE F*** DO YOU MEAN OK! I\'M GOING TO BURN TO DEATH!'

'Your suit can withstand up to 200 degreaes.'

'Oh. Well. Um... now what?'

'Your Suit will be destroyed from the shrapnall when the pod explodes. Leaving to Suffocate in space'

'WELL THATS A NOT BETTER WAY TO DYE! MAYBE MY BODY WILL FALL TO KERBAL SO I CAN BE BURIDED!'

'maybe. maybe. i have yet to meet person who can out start space. But there\'s always a first for everything! Right? Jeb?'

'Time to do what i do best. 8)'
I now noticed, that kerbal is cross-eyed !
